sentences.en: A small drop in the inflation rate was cold comfort for the millions without a job.
sentences.cn: 对数百万失业者来说，通货膨胀率的微降是不起作用的安慰。

sentences.en: Alan was very reluctant to leave the warmth and comfort of the fire.
sentences.cn: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.en: changes are happening too rapidly for comfort.
sentences.cn: 变化发生得太快了，令人不适。

sentences.en: For me, spaghetti bolognese is the ultimate comfort food.
sentences.cn: 意大利肉酱面是绝好的安慰食物。

sentences.en: He began to comfort me with such unaccustomed gentleness.
sentences.cn: 他开始以那种少有的温柔安慰我。

sentences.en: He found comfort in Eva's blind faith in him.
sentences.cn: 伊娃对他的盲目信任让他感到宽慰。

sentences.en: He grew up in the comfort of the Surrey stockbroker belt.
sentences.cn: 他在萨里市郊富人聚居区的舒适环境中长大。

sentences.en: He longed to take her in his arms and comfort her.
sentences.cn: 他很想把她搂在怀里安慰她。

sentences.en: I dress for comfort, not fashion.
sentences.cn: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.en: It's a comfort talking to you.
sentences.cn: 跟你聊一聊我好受多了。

sentences.en: John's mother and sister rallied round offering comfort.
sentences.cn: 约翰的母亲和姐姐到他身边给予安慰。

sentences.en: Mr Aston’s father was last night being comforted by relatives.
sentences.cn: 昨晚亲戚们都在安慰阿斯顿先生的父亲。

sentences.en: Mr Dinkins visited the bereaved family to offer comfort.
sentences.cn: 丁金斯先生前往死者家吊唁。

sentences.en: Ned put his arm around her, trying to comfort her.
sentences.cn: 内德搂着她，想安慰她。

sentences.en: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.cn: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

sentences.en: She took her in her arms and tried to comfort her.
sentences.cn: 她把她揽进怀里，尽力安慰她。

sentences.en: The blanket will provide additional warmth and comfort in bed.
sentences.cn: 毛毯能让你睡得更温暖、更舒适。

sentences.en: The jumper strikes the perfect balance between comfort and smartness.
sentences.cn: 这件套头毛衣又舒服又漂亮。

sentences.en: The word " armchair " has connotations of comfort and relaxation.
sentences.cn: armchair这个词隐含着舒适悠然的意思.

sentences.en: These tennis shoes are designed for comfort and performance.
sentences.cn: 这些网球鞋的设计穿起来舒服，易于发挥成绩。

sentences.en: This new design will offer undreamed-of levels of comfort, safety and speed.
sentences.cn: 这种新设计将会给您带来意想不到的舒适、安全和快捷。

sentences.en: Whenever he was upset, he would turn to her for comfort and advice.
sentences.cn: 他每当心烦意乱时，就会去向她寻求安慰和建议。

sentences.en: Within hours of the news, Helen arrived to comfort her heartbroken friend.
sentences.cn: 得到消息几小时以后，海伦赶来安慰她那心碎的朋友。

words.tran_cn: 不舒服的；无安慰的；不自由的
安慰者；圣灵；（美）被子；（英）羊毛围巾

phrases.tran_cn: 太…以至不舒适（或不自在）

trans.tran_cn: 舒适，安逸生活，安慰，感到安慰的人/物，使生活舒适的东西
trans.tran_en: a feeling of being physically relaxed and satisfied, so that nothing is hurting you, making you feel too hot or cold etc
to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them
